text: Matthew Lee Cappotelli (November 12, 1979 â€“ June 29, 2018) was an American professional wrestler. He was born in Caledonia, New York. He won the Tough Enough III with John Hennigan. He worked in Ohio Valley Wrestling (OVW), the primary developmental territory for WWE. In July 2017, Cappotelli was diagnosed with glioblastoma, a rare form of brain cancer. He stopped his cancer treatment in May 2018. He died on June 29, 2018 in Louisville, Kentucky, aged 38. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Matt Cappotelli
